Author: someone52207
Text: I get that, but then it seems difficult to distinguish between bulimia and AN-BP. I guess it's not too big of a difference. And part of the fraud feeling is it just seems like recovering has been too easy (physically). I guess I'm still working on accepting that mental struggles are just as valid as physical ones. It's hard to accept there's something wrong when I don't have physical evidence

Author: livipup
Text: To be fair, there is no justification for making low weight a diagnostic criteria for anorexia. It's a *mental* illness. It's categorized by a person's feelings and behaviours. You're not a fraud for trying recovery either.
